name: tabtogether
description: Send tabs to multiple devices simultaneously.
author: Ron Katzir

scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs background/background.js -o dist/background.js && uglifyjs common/utils.js -o dist/utils.js && uglifyjs ui/popup/popup.js -o dist/popup.js && uglifyjs ui/options/options.js -o dist/options.js && uglifyjs ui/shared/shared-ui.js -o dist/shared-ui.js && uglifyjs ui/shared/theme.js -o dist/theme.js && uglifyjs common/constants.js -o dist/constants.js
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o dist/styles.css ui/styles.css && cleancss -o dist/popup.css ui/popup/popup.css && cleancss -o dist/shared-ui.css ui/shared/shared-ui.css
scripts.minify:html: html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments -o dist/popup.html ui/popup/popup.html && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments -o dist/options.html ui/options/options.html
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:html
scripts.prepare-dist: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true }); fs.mkdirSync('dist', { recursive: true }); ['manifest.json', 'LICENSE', 'SECURITY.md', 'README.md'].forEach(f => fs.copyFileSync(f, 'dist/' + f)); fs.cpSync('icons', 'dist/icons', { recursive: true });"
scripts.build:prod: npm run prepare-dist && npm run minify
scripts.build: npm run build:prod && web-ext build --source-dir dist --artifacts-dir web-ext-artifacts --overwrite-dest
scripts.package: echo 'Use GitHub Actions workflow for packaging.'
